queriesList.title: para-query example
queriesList.description: Return all nodes of a certain type

queriesList.query: match (a) where not a:Perspective__tech_ optional match (a)-[r]->(b) where not  b:Perspective__tech_ and  type(r) <> "pos__tech_" return * limit 30
